head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CREED, ANNIE R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CREED, ANNIE R.

block.p: CREED-Annie R. At the age of 36. Beloved daughter of John F. and Anne M. Creed. Memorial Mass 2PM, today, August 3, at the Convent of the Sacred Heart, 1 East 91st Street, New York City. In lieu of flowers, contributions in memory of Annie may be made to the Convent of the Sacred Heart.

CREED-Annie. The Catholic Big Sisters notes with sadness the death of Annie Creed, daughter of our dear friend, Board member and past President Anne Creed. Our thoughts and prayers are with you and Jack. Margaret C. Sheridan, President
